sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, cast_info ci
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.production_year  =  1987 AND mc.company_id  >  18261 AND mc.company_type_id  >  1 AND ci.role_id  >  1
